product_name: Royal Robbins Windsong Hooded Shirt Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Call it a hoodie, windbreaker or sun shirt, the women's Windsong Hooded Shirt Jacket from Royal Robbins is an amazingly lightweight do-almost-anything top that you'll pack for every trip. Made of aptly named Whisper Weight nylon, the Windsong weighs a mere 2.5 oz.! It's soft, subtly textured, wrinkle resistant, moisture wicking and fast drying-what's not to like?. It also offers UPF 50+ sun protection, and has special extended cuffs that block sun from the backs of your hands and fold up when not needed. Mesh-lined yoke and back and side vents add comfort. Royal Robbins Windsong Hooded Shirt Jacket has a 2-way front zipper and zippered hand pockets. Tabs hold rolled-up sleeves; hood has adjustable drawcord. Closeout.
short_description: Call it a hoodie, windbreaker or sun shirt, the women's Windsong Hooded Shirt Jacket from Royal Robbins is an amazingly lightweight do-almost-anything top that you'll pack for every trip.
